successes.title: SmartScope - Reinventing the oscilloscope
successes.description:
The world's first 100MS/s open source oscilloscope for iPad, Android and PC.
A must-have for every Arduino and Raspberry Pi developer!

Pledges.description:
VIRTUAL HIGH FIVE! 
Thank you for supporting us! You receive a virtual high five of all LabNation team members! Add another five to make it a high ten :-)
PCB! Receive the printed circuit board (without components). Great to have the PCB in your hands while you're examining the open-source layout files.
CONTRIBUTOR! Get early SW access on the different platforms, get weekly updates. and give us feedback on what you like and what you'd like to see changed.

EARLY BIRDS SPECIAL!
Be among the first 100 backers and receive the SmartScope at a special price before everybody else! Black version, including 2 probes, logic analyzer probes set and mini USB cable

BASIC SMARTSCOPE KIT!
One black SmartScope including 2 probes, logic analyzer probes set and mini USB cable.

SMARTSCOPE iPad/iPod KIT!
Add a 30pin connector cable to the basic SmartScope kit and connect with your 30pin Apple device.

SMARTSCOPE ANDROID KIT!
Add a micro USB cable to the basic SmartScope kit and connect with your android device.
BASIC SMARTSCOPE RAM KIT! One black SmartScope with 16Mbit of RAM, including 2 probes, logic analyzer probes set and mini USB cable.

SMARTSCOPE LIGHTNING KIT!
Add a lightning connector cable to the basic SmartScope kit and connect with your last generation Apple device.
SMARTSCOPE RAM ANDROID KIT! Add a micro USB cable to the basic SmartScope RAM Kit and connect with your Android device.
SMARTSCOPE RAM iPad/iPod KIT! Add a 30pin connector cable to the basic SmartScope RAM Kit and connect with your 30pin Apple device.
SMARTSCOPE RAM LIGHTNING KIT! Add a lightning connector cable to the basic SmartScope RAM Kit and connect with your last generation Apple device.

SMARTSCOPE 4 CHANNEL KIT!
Receive 2 SmartScope basic kits with additional synchronisation cable and expand to a 4 channel oscilloscope!
SMARTSCOPE RAM 4 CHANNEL KIT! Receive 2 SmartScope RAM basic kits with additional synchronisation cable and expand to a 4 channel oscilloscope!

HACKER SPECIAL!
Receive one exclusive silver SmartScope + all the development tools you need to get 100% access to the FPGA and USB PIC controller: Xilinx Platform USB Cable II+ PICKIT3 + accessories and kickstart your own hardware projects. These additional tools will give you full visibility inside the PIC and FPGA components, allowing you to put breakpoints and to debug them at the finest level.
